title: You Would Be Sexier If You Were Dead

lines.content: I want to push it out and push it in;
The knife that I want to stab into your skin.
I feel your heart violently throbbing,
After I rip it right out of your decaying body.
I want to be underneath you,
Hanging from your noose;
I want you on the inside
Of a coffin tomb.
I want to feel your blood
Spurting out of your major arteries.
I want to feel your skin,
Which has been peeled off from your body.
For whom does the bell toll?
No matter which pretty it tolls for,
It tolls for me.
Now, baby—don’t be like that;
All you need to do is hack your back with an axe,
It won’t be that bad.
Would it kill you to just kill yourself a little bit?
God, you don’t need to bitch about it.
Jesus killed himself for everyone’s love;
What, are you just too good for us?
I’m sorry you’re not human like us other “inferiors”,
So go fuck your living people like the other elitist jerks.
I’m glad you finally see it from my side;
Now, you just have to slit your throat like this—
You’ll be fine.
Yes, like that. No, no, no. Yeah, you’re doing it perfectly.
Hmm... You know, she now looks kind of ugly.
Yeah, you know, I change my mind—dead people don’t look as sexy as they say.
Thanks for your cooperation, honey, anyway.
